summary: Americanized Trousers for the Ragged Hero of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacement texture for the [color=orange][Ragged Trousers][/color]. 
To get the ragged trousers right away type in console: player.addtem 8f19a 1.

Download: Use Nexus Mod Manager or extract to your skyrim/data folder.

Thanks and have fun, [color=yellow]hero[/color].

EDIT: Currently looking into making these trousers into a craft recipe with Light/Heavy Armor attributes in case any of you would rather wear it if it had an armor rating.

2EDIT: Be sure to check out my newly released Rex-Kwon-Do Pants. (I see them as a big improvement from these) Plus they\'re craftable and upgradeable heavy armor! 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7449]Rex-Kwon-Do\'s Warmups[/url]
author: MrSamB

files.name: Ragged American Trousers fixed texture patch
